website_summaries.verdict: A breathable and fashionable cowboy hat that is a terrific option for men and women alike.
pros: Includes a sweat-absorbent inner band for extra comfort
Available in various lovely woven patterns
Wide brim helps shield and block harmful sun rays from your eyes and face
Perfect for casual wear or as a costume accessory
cons: Color may chip away over time
Fit may be too tight for some adults

customer_reviews.title: This hat just looked like on the website
customer_reviews.text: for ranch culture environment, I have seen lots of different cowboy- style hat. This hat just looked like on the website. It is packed well. and I love the quality for the price. it is perfect to fit me. able to curved up at the side or down low by your preference. It is cute on hair. I got compliments on the hat.
customer_reviews.author: SES

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, slightly small.
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit tight, but I stretched it out over a mixing bowl for a couple days, and it fit just fine. I wore this to Country Thunder in Florence, AZ.... it stood up to 6 straight days of abuse, and is ready to go again next year. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rickey

customer_reviews.title: Quality  could have been a little better...materials is kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect for me ..got a lots of complement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually looks better than the picture and fit perfectly. Not too big or too small for a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cowgirl
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the straw hat w/band that has a turquoise stone. For the price, I purchased for an event, but am so please on how nice it is, that I will be wearing it more than just the event! I measured my head at 22", and this had fits loose, but not big. I will be able to fix my long hair any way I want when wearing this hat. It's firm, but not still pliable enough to manipulate the edges the way I like.
customer_reviews.author: BEH

customer_reviews.title: Taco Hat
customer_reviews.text: Horrible packaging. Item comes in a plastic bag. It was completely crushed. The wiring was soft enough to straighten out BUT the hat has dents everywhere. I tried steaming it a bit and reshaping it. I will update this review again after 24 hours to show if that helped. This item would have been perfect if it was packaged in a box with tissue in the crown. Although it is not an expensive hat it should still be as described. You can’t wear a taco on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Shineh175

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hat for my granddaughter and it looks great on her. She loves it. Price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C.

customer_reviews.title: Good party hat
customer_reviews.text: Decent cheap hat. Fit well and was comfortable for all day wear. Got a compliment on it when I wore it. It came crushed but I was able to reform without much trouble as the hat has a bendable wires frame I think. Comes with a chin strap but is easy to cut off. Does not seem super durable and leaves some straw dust behind when it's bumped, but is great for an occasional hat and I would but again for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Random Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear a wide brim hat when doing outside chores around the house to keep the sun of me and protect the top of my head. This is lightweight and comfortable and doesn't cause my head to sweat. Is is a nice change from a boonie hat which I too often wear a lot when working outdoors and because of its low price you don't have to worry if it gets a little beat up its not as if it is a $200 Stetson Carson, so you can wear it and enjoy no worries
customer_reviews.author: Draven

customer_reviews.title: GREAT hat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the hat, you can actually hear about it in the video I uploaded here! Take care and love to you all xoxo
customer_reviews.author: ThaisMayaOfficial / Zefa Real

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This hat seemed like the perfect one to order, but what I got was not very impressive. The shape was all askew, and I had to fiddle with the edges to make it look halfway decent. It arrived on a timely basis, and the fit is okay. What is not okay is that it is bent every which way around the edges. Also, the dark brown tinting is off center. Save your money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: zesty

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I go horseback riding often and this will be perfect! Just shape as edgy as you want to go with it! Will post photos once I get some. The fit is perfect. It's comfortable and "breathes". Can shape it to be a beach hat or hiking hat, anything! But cowboy shape is my favorite. Great quality and material. Better than ones I've checked out at western stores and Outdoor World.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have a large head
customer_reviews.text: The hat is really cute. It is advertised as a men and women's. I hadn't noticed that until after I received it and looked back on my order. Looking at the hat, I don't see it as a man's hat at all. It fits like a man's hat though. It is for a very large head. I'm going to get some brim padding and try to make it work because it is a cute hat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought it again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to a horseback riding ranch because I couldn’t find the same one I purchased a few years ago. I love it that much!! It does need a little shaping after unpacking but once you get it shaped the way you want it holds the shape very well. Has a cord so it doesn’t fly off your head while riding or simply wearing. You can also choose to use the cord to rest comfortably on your neck to let it just hang behind you instead of wearing it on your head. Very cute addition to my cowgirl look!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Corr

customer_reviews.title: Nice Straw Hat for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is not the highest quality, but it is firm and perfect for riding horses, as I don't want anything too fancy! It will bend to your liking. I have a small head, so it is a little big on me, but with a head band on, it fits me fine. It has a stampede strap, too, which makes it stay on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer TC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVED IT! a tiny bit bent when it arrived but overall, great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy, Multipurpose Hat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design, looks classy and expensive. I have a very small head and struggle with purchasing any kind of hat. This hat although very slightly loose on my head I was able to secure it with the hat string. I purchased for a country western event, it went well with my full outfit, although you do get hot in it. Packaged and received in good condition. I like the multi purpose use of it.
customer_reviews.author: SpanishEyes

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat, perfect for keeping the sun out of my eyes. The fit was little large, which was okay as I placed a little sweat band on the inside. Hat is pretty pliable , so I could shape it easily depending on the amount of sun protection I needed and then then back into "cute" shape. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for a party or even wearing out socially.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the style and the fact that it is flexible, so you can adjust it in different ways, that are most flattering to your face. Fit perfectly [ didn't need the neck strap - although it is nice to have if you need it and it can be removed if you're not using it. It looked great on me and my husband liked it also - his fit perfectly also. I bought the hat because our seniors group is having a Western dance/social and I needed a hat to complete my outfit. Very comfortable and I would recommend it to a friend. Really love this hat. Received it within 2 days .
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Darnell

customer_reviews.title: A bit too large for my small head
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time!!!! It looked just like the photo, a little too large.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Chahal

customer_reviews.title: Great hat
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat. It was perfect for my trip to Texas. It fits nicely and is not cheaply made. Delivery was prompt. I may buy another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Giddy up Y’all
customer_reviews.text: Very happy - fits perfectly and the chin strap will help when I am horseback riding. Lightweight and airy which is what I need - provides shade but won’t trap the heat. Con - the “bead” is not centered so looks like the hat is not sitting on head correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: AS ADVERTISED...... I'D RECOMMEND FOR THAT COUNTRY CONCERT TYPE THING...
customer_reviews.text: I THINK IT'S WORTH THE 25.00.... NICELY MADE FOR AN OCCASION WEAR. I HAVEN'T WORN IT YET JUST FROM WHAT I'VE SEEN OF IT... I DON'T THINK IT'S A DAILY WEARER... HOWEVER CHECK BACK I'LL HAVE MORE INFO AFTER I'VE WORN IT A FEW TIMES. AND THE STRAPS ARE SORTA CLIP ONS IN WHICH IF YOU DON'T WANT THEM YOU WILL HAVE TO CUT OFF THE CLIP PART THAT'S MADE INTO THE INNER SWEAT BAND.
customer_reviews.author: KITTI

customer_reviews.title: Just what
customer_reviews.text: This hat was great. Fit well and I received lots of compliments on it. This seller was also reliable and prompt. Some of the other sellers of similar cowboy hats are slower and do not honor free returns. But this particular seller was great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Badly Bent Brim
customer_reviews.text: This hat is cute, but it arrived bent out-of-shape, I cannot use it for the event I am attending in 2 days. It's a very stiff material. SAD :'( Update: I was able to play with it and it was wearable. Took a little time, that's all.
customer_reviews.author: patricia Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable hat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who can be hard on things. The hat is holding up well and is really pretty and feminine for a pre-teen, active kid. We like the bendable, shapeable brim. It's a great feature for a hat that gets tossed around quite a bit. Good quality and value without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased this hat to create a bridal shower veil for my sister-in-law. It was too pretty to glue flowers and tulle to it....so I kept it! Its a great fit, I always receive compliments when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D. Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the way it came in a package and not a box everything just as bad. So I had to straighten the hat out which is okay you got to pick up a seat. I do have a big head and the hat does fit well I like the look but I don't know how long it can last being that I wear it everyday. But I do like the look of that on off I'm pleased with it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Hat was hard, like plastic
customer_reviews.text: This hat was shellacked or something; it was stiff and hard. The opening for your head was way too big. And the way the sides are curled was weird, not natural. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: CaringConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a country concert that unfortunately got cancelled, but I will be keeping it anyways cause it’s so darn cute! Pretty flexible hat too so you can shape it to your liking & looks to be a very good quality hat.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cowgirl hat!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! You want a cute cowboy hat? THIS IS IT!! It's s not going to make you hot and sweaty. Its very breathable U can adjust it. It's just beautiful. I got a lot of compliments on it. I can't wait to wear it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy cowgirl!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my hat! Bought it for a hoe down, & will wear it anytime I attend an event that calls for some honkey-tonk attire! It was shipped carefully wrapped, & a plastic hat piece was placed inside to help keep its shape during shipping! It arrived in perfect condition! It is kind of small but that wasn’t a concern for me!
customer_reviews.author: AngelFire

customer_reviews.title: Misshaped due to shipment
customer_reviews.text: Hat is completely misshaped due to shipment. It does have the wire to easily shape it, but I haven't succeeded. I bought another cowboy hat from a different vendor and did not have this issue. Otherwise, the product seems nice. Looks more feminine to me then to be considered uni.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. Tippit

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hat
customer_reviews.text: It's a sturdy hat and looks exactly like the image shows made well only problem I had is it needed to be reshaped a little because it was bent in one corner when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Breathable
customer_reviews.text: This hat has an elastic band and a string that runs under the chin. It's removable but I like it. The pattern is pretty wide but has kept the sun off my face. It did deform a bit in the pool (to be expected). Try not to get it real wet. It gets above average use, I use it for all outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Great hat and outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: This hat is well made and looks like a real cowboy hat that has been worn in. It folds and molds easily for a great look. I received lots of compliments. Great value for the price. Fits men's size 9 to 10 perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DBurks

customer_reviews.title: Great hat
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Bought this for a country music concert. It was comfortable and cute. My only complain would be that after I removed the strap I wasn't able to put them back on because the snap closure broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: The entire rim seems to have an embedded piece of wire for easy shaping (or RESHAPING in this case)
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as advertised, but was delivered in a thin, plastic shipping bag ..... Bent and deformed. The entire rim seems to have an embedded piece of wire for easy shaping (or RESHAPING in this case), but I think I would still call this a packaging fail.
customer_reviews.author: shaeleymae

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality, fits well
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large head size. I purchased XL and it fit fine. This is a very high quality hat not simply a 'party hat' to dress up. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: TTW

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a hat for a western themed party. I read the reviews but decided to go with it because the price was perfect. The packaging was nice. The hat looked amazing on me. I received tons of compliments at the party. This hat size was perfect for my straight hair. I will wear this hat again when I go to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for.my daughter for a beach trip. Totally went with all her outfit's and the hat really looked amazing on her. Recieved many complements on it. Light weight, very comfortable and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Smashed!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a huge box smashed.... The hat is made with stiff material so hopefully I can bend it back and get it to look half decent.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Completely off centered. Poor quality visually
customer_reviews.text: The hat was crushed when I received it but I thought I could just reshape it because it’s kind of a soft material. After a few minutes I realized the hat shape was stamped off center. One side is noticeably larger than the other, and the darker spray is not at all where it should be. It would be fine for a play hat, but that is not what I purchased it for. I wouldn’t buy again. I won’t return it because of the $5 return charge.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and flattering.
customer_reviews.text: I used this fir a “Country” night at a country club. The hat is light weight and easy to wear. My head is rather large and it did fit, but with no room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: New to Cobra and loving it!

customer_reviews.title: The box was crushed and the hat was folded over ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was crushed and the hat was folded over inside the box. Some of the weaving distorted and the color was chipped away from the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Good for the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I got this hat for a concert, and it was perfect for the event. It is plastic, and not that comfortable, but achieved the look I was going for. I would not plan on wearing this for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: JFS

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat as a prop for a photo shoot. I don't know if the fit is right because I won't wear it! But it was surely very nice using it for my photography!!
customer_reviews.author: sycamore

customer_reviews.title: Cute hat!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and stylish hat! I really liked how the outside had wiring so I can shape the hat how I want it to look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous hat!!! It came well packaged! It fit great! It’s beautiful for females! I love it! A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela T.

customer_reviews.title: Cowboy hat turquoise stine
customer_reviews.text: Loved very stylish for a barnyard party as well as rodeo in Alabama that my daughter attended she received many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my niece, she absolutely loves it. She shows lambs at fairs. So going to use it for shows. Very well made
customer_reviews.author: toni hall

customer_reviews.title: The hat appeared to have been sat on.
customer_reviews.text: The hat appeared to have been sat on. The upper part could not be properly shaped. The brim could be fixed but she wouldn.t wear a weirdly looking hat. Will look for a better suppler.
customer_reviews.author: art77554

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Sexy!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy sexy and I believe I have brought back the cowgirl trend now everyone wants one lol
customer_reviews.author: Izah

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, looked cool
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, the material is bendable. (Does not hold form.. like if you bump it or drop it.) Looks good, received many complements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Overall was very happy, it was a little bent when it arrived, however I was able to reshape it. Made it just in time for western day for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: It is such a nice hat! I got this for my step mom for her birthday and she loved it! Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Banana 408

customer_reviews.title: Cowboy Hat Defective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat but unfortunately it is made crooked so you cannot wear it. I had to return twice so I would expect they are all defective. I would not chance ordering. I attached a photo so you can see the issue from the top view which also makes the stone in front way off center.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for mowing grass and keep the sun off. Good quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Glen Davis _

customer_reviews.title: Super deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat, looks great, feels good, hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Carlson

customer_reviews.title: great hat - good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a week of riding at a horse ranch in Colorado. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crumbled hat
customer_reviews.text: All crumbled edges nothing like in images. Ordered replacement but still same issue. So returned.
customer_reviews.author: Azad Bajaj

customer_reviews.title: Great cowboy hat - not for small heads!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price, just too big for a small women's head!
customer_reviews.author: legallyblond26

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty hat. Just received it kinda bent up and was hard to get it into the shape I wanted it. Was used for a church play so it got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer de la Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great looking hat
customer_reviews.text: Fit great looked great just did not like the plastic strap holder on each side I would jave given it a 5 Also it's bendable
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Grate

customer_reviews.title: It was packed very poorly for shipping. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was packed very poorly for shipping. It was too large for both my husband and I. Looked more feminine to me although I bought it for him. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hathorn

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged, not crushed
customer_reviews.text: It was very well packaged. It was not crushed and the box it was packaged in was big enough for the hat to fit. I Love this hat!!
customer_reviews.author: V.M

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine but it was not handed to a resident. It was left outside the doors to our building
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Deane

customer_reviews.title: Ver fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Cool & Funny at the same time. Fits nicely as well!
customer_reviews.author: MPM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, chic and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight hat! Great style, goes well with any outfit. I got mine to go horseback riding out West. I would recommend adding some string to reinforce it doesn't fly off if you're getting it for a similar reason. The rim is adjustable, you can have them folded up high or just circular around the rim. When taking photos with it on, prop it up a bit so you don't have the shadow of holes on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very good looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and how it fits.im going to go horse back riding soon and will be so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Off set
customer_reviews.text: Trim going around middle is not centered and glued down. Otherwise would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Megan_A

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Packaging was perfect. Exactly what I wanted. And looked just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Need to return please.
customer_reviews.text: Too tall on my head. I need to return this item but the window has closed. I would appreciate someone contacting me so that I can return with a full refund. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: bbw1101

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Only western hat ever ordered never saw or tried on and was perfect fit Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly but arrived almost crushed because of the horrible box
customer_reviews.author: Mary k.

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality and it came in a box that deformed the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Rkhachik

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great had, only wished it came with a string for under the chin.
customer_reviews.author: W. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a joke and quality is awful- do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: mary jo gannon

customer_reviews.title: Blue stone off center
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great but I am disappointed that the blue stone is not centered on my hat...makes it looks cheap. Can’t decide if I am going to keep it or not...
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cute hat
customer_reviews.text: Got my hat just now. I like it! It’s super comfy and light. I have a small head and it fits good (just slightly loose but not in a disturbing way). It has an adjustable strip which you are able to take off. You won’t get a real cowboy hat but for the price it’s totally fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat. I wore for a Jason Aldean Concert
customer_reviews.text: Great Hat . I wore for a Jason Aldean Concert. I received many compliments. Great fit !
customer_reviews.author: Kelley McInerney

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture but.....
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and it goes with the cowboy boots I just bought. The only problem is the ends around the hat are bent crazy and it’s hard to bend it back
customer_reviews.author: Bre p

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have worn this hat several times and it is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Appearance
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my granddaughter, who will be attending college in Texas in the fall. She already had boots. Just needed this hat! She loves it and it looks adorable on her!
customer_reviews.author: SKYoung

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The fit is slightly odd, but it’s very cute and I can’t wait to put the rest of my cowgirl costume with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Abigaile Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hat.
customer_reviews.text: Hat is really nice. You do have to shape it but it is manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great on my husbands
customer_reviews.text: Got this hat for my husband for xmas he really likes it . Looks great on him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Crooked
customer_reviews.text: I love the hat, it’s very sturdy and really cute! But it’s crooked! It’s hard to tell from the pictures but it’s noticeable in person. Sadly, I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 Cowboy hat if your head is bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Cute hat, but way too big. I took the strap that pulls it tight to your head off but the side hook up slots show. Looks pretty tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Z

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! My Dad loves this hat! Fits him well and he wears it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Looked Cock-eyed
customer_reviews.text: The hat was ok but hat band was not centered and brown spray on crown looked like a drunk sprayed it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I just needed it for a trip to Florida and it went well with anything I wore! Very lightweight and it doesn’t look too cheap. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Leyla

customer_reviews.title: Western hat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and shipping was fast ...
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Hat Band not Centered.
customer_reviews.text: The hat band is not centered and it's glued down so I can't fix it. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mitzie greenhaw

customer_reviews.title: It toke almost a month to get it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my hat, I used it for a Birthday party!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daricka Munford

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hat
customer_reviews.text: The hat is nice, wish it could have been protected by being shipped in a box.. it was really flat when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a hat to wear on the beach and it’s perfect - the edges pull up just how I want it to look
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is perfect!!!! It was packaged beautifully and has great structure! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hat for my daughter since she's heading to school in the west. Perfect for theme parties and occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: CBM

customer_reviews.title: Not well Packaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the hat but when it arrived it was all bent up. Took me awhile to bend it back to shape
customer_reviews.author: Tara Baker

product_meta.title: Livingston Men & Women's Woven Straw Cowboy Hat w/Hat Band
product_meta.description:
Giddy-up, save a horse, and ride a cowboy! 
The popularity of straw hats is exploding in urban centers from New York to Mexico City - spend 15 minutes at an airport and count how many you see! 
These particular ones are better quality than most with rolled brim, duo-tone color staining and beaded or bull band. 
Great on their own or with accessories from our store, for everyday use around town and the golf course, and awesome for Halloween and country-western themes!


Material: Synthetic Straw
Size: Circumference About: 22.4", Height: 4.5", Front Brim: 3.5"
Style: Cowboy/Western


Package Includes:
1 x Straw Hat
feature_bullets: Available in various lovely woven patterns
Features an eye-catching statement piece hat band
Includes a sweat absorbent inner band for added comfort; Wide brim helps shield & block harmful sun rays from the eyes & face; Great for everyday casual wear or as a costume accessory
